topic.title: List Marker Styling and the :marker Pseudo Element)

section.title: The list-style-type and list-style-image CSS Properties
section.p:
supports the following values for the list-style-type property:
box
check
circle
diamond
disc
hyphen
square
none
decimal
lower-roman/lower-latin
upper-roman/upper-latin
decimal-leading-zero To use an image as a marker instead of a standard bullet or number, you can use the list-style-image property. You have to use the url function to point to an image resource:li { list-style-image: url("images/my_list_bullet.svg"); }
